summary: A young boy stays with his aunt and uncle and befriends his cousin, a boy of the same age who shows increasing signs of violent and psychopathic behavior.
cast: Macaulay Culkin|Elijah Wood|Wendy Crewson|David Morse|Daniel Hugh Kelly|Jacqueline Brookes|Quinn Culkin|Ashley Crow|Guy Strauss|Keith Brava|Jerem Goodwin|Andria Hall|Bobby Huber|Mark Stefanich|Susan Hopper|Rory Culkin|Christopher C. Murphy|Dale Resteghini
keywords: evil child|psychopath|killer child|child in jeopardy|killing a dog
title: El buen hijo
